action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
print "Palo Alto Networks VM Configuration"
def postrequest(api_url,payload):
  r = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST',auth="BASIC", params=payload, user='admin', passwd='admin', verify=False, timeout=30)
  if 'success' in r.content:
    return r.content
  else:
    print "PAN-OS API configuration failed",r.content
    exit(1)

url1 = "https://@@{address}@@/api"
#Get the auth key for making API requests
payload = {'type': 'keygen', 'user': '@@{admin.username}@@', 'password': '@@{admin.secret}@@'}
key_str = postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)
key = key_str.split('<key>')[1].split('</key>')[0]


#Get serial number

payload = {'type': 'version', 'key':key}
serial_data = postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)
serial_no = serial_data.split('<serial>')[1].split('</serial>')[0]
print "Serial no. of Palo Alto Firewall is:",serial_no


print "Adding the firewall to Panorama"

url1 = "https://@@{Panorama_IP}@@/api"

#Get the auth key for making API requests
payload = {'type': 'keygen', 'user': '@@{Panorama_Username}@@', 'password': '@@{Panorama_Password}@@'}
key_str = postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)
key = key_str.split('<key>')[1].split('</key>')[0]

#Attach device to Panorama
device_attach = device_attach = "/config/mgt-config/devices/entry[@name='"+serial_no+"']"

payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':device_attach, 'element':"<vsys/>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#Attach device to device group

print "Associating VMs to Panorama Device Group"

device_group = "/config/devices/entry[@name='localhost.localdomain']/device-group/entry[@name='@@{Panorama_DeviceGroup}@@']/devices/entry[@name='" + serial_no + "']"
payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':device_group, 'element':"<vsys/>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#Attach device to template stack

print "Associating VMs to Panorama Template and Template Stack"

template_stack = "/config/devices/entry[@name='localhost.localdomain']/template-stack/entry[@name='@@{Panorama_TemplateStack}@@']/devices/entry[@name='"+serial_no+"']"
payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':template_stack, 'element':"<variable/>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#commit and Push the changes
payload = {'type': 'commit', 'cmd': '<commit-all></commit-all>', 'key':key}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

sleep(120)

#Set device to auto push to receive updates
device_attach = device_attach = "/config/mgt-config/devices/entry[@name='"+serial_no+"']"

payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':device_attach, 'element':"<auto-push>yes</auto-push>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#commit and Push the changes
payload = {'type': 'commit', 'cmd': '<commit-all></commit-all>', 'key':key}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
print "Palo Alto Networks VM Configuration"
def postrequest(api_url,payload):
  r = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST',auth="BASIC", params=payload, user='admin', passwd='admin', verify=False, timeout=30)
  if 'success' in r.content:
    return r.content
  else:
    print "PAN-OS API configuration failed",r.content
    exit(1)

url1 = "https://@@{address}@@/api"
#Get the auth key for making API requests
payload = {'type': 'keygen', 'user': '@@{admin.username}@@', 'password': '@@{admin.secret}@@'}
key_str = postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)
key = key_str.split('<key>')[1].split('</key>')[0]


#Get serial number

payload = {'type': 'version', 'key':key}
serial_data = postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)
serial_no = serial_data.split('<serial>')[1].split('</serial>')[0]
print "Serial no. of Palo Alto Firewall is:",serial_no


print "Adding the firewall to Panorama"

url1 = "https://@@{Panorama_IP}@@/api"

#Get the auth key for making API requests
payload = {'type': 'keygen', 'user': '@@{Panorama_Username}@@', 'password': '@@{Panorama_Password}@@'}
key_str = postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)
key = key_str.split('<key>')[1].split('</key>')[0]

#Attach device to Panorama
device_attach = device_attach = "/config/mgt-config/devices/entry[@name='"+serial_no+"']"

payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':device_attach, 'element':"<vsys/>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#Attach device to device group

print "Associating VMs to Panorama Device Group"

device_group = "/config/devices/entry[@name='localhost.localdomain']/device-group/entry[@name='@@{Panorama_DeviceGroup}@@']/devices/entry[@name='" + serial_no + "']"
payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':device_group, 'element':"<vsys/>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#Attach device to template stack

print "Associating VMs to Panorama Template and Template Stack"

template_stack = "/config/devices/entry[@name='localhost.localdomain']/template-stack/entry[@name='@@{Panorama_TemplateStack}@@']/devices/entry[@name='"+serial_no+"']"
payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':template_stack, 'element':"<variable/>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#commit and Push the changes
payload = {'type': 'commit', 'cmd': '<commit-all></commit-all>', 'key':key}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

sleep(120)

#Set device to auto push to receive updates
device_attach = device_attach = "/config/mgt-config/devices/entry[@name='"+serial_no+"']"

payload = {'type': 'config', 'action': 'set', 'key':key, 'xpath':device_attach, 'element':"<auto-push>yes</auto-push>"}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)

#commit and Push the changes
payload = {'type': 'commit', 'cmd': '<commit-all></commit-all>', 'key':key}
print postrequest(api_url=url1,payload=payload)
